Zathroth Remmants.description:
A remnant cult of Zathroth has formed in a forbidden temple beneath Carlin. Find out what's behind this and stop it in time.
Temporarily vaporised souls:
10 Decaying
10 Withering

Paw and Fur: The Noxious Spawn.description: Try find its hideout and kill it.

Paw and Fur: Ranger.description: You are Ranger of the Paw and Fur hunting elite. You currently have 24 Paw and Fur points.

Mission 03: Strangers in the Night.description: You already reported Ongulf about primitive humans! Ask Ongulf for new mission!

Mission 08: An Offer You Can't Refuse.description: Take the boat at the northern of Dragonblaze Peaks to tournament Isle. Ask Zurak for a passage. There you'll learn anything you need to know about the great tournament. Ask there Chrak for the battle.

Mission 04: The Mine Is Mine.description: You killed the Shard of Corruption. Return to Ongulf and report your mission!

Mission 01: New Land.description: You already reported Ongulf your success! Ask Ongulf for new mission!

Mission 06: Days Of Doom.description: You passed the test of Curos. Return to Ongulf and report your mission!

Mission 02: From Kazordoon With Love.description: Return to Ongulf and report your mission!

Mission 05: Getting Things Busy.description: You got support from all needed people to help farmine! Return to Ongulf and report your mission!
